personal.bio: hello, fren. i'm larissa, i'm an infra engineer based in brasil. currently merging my infra skills with AI so engineers won't be paged at 3am. i want to make the internet fun again.
personal.funBio: i'm a multi-instrumentalist, horror nerd, gamer, bookworm and take care of a small zoo.
personal.aboutSite: this website is my love letter to my first contact with a computer. windows xp was my first ever OS in a huge white-beige computer, where I used to watch a lot of youtube videos related to naruto and games, play games on clickgames.com.br & habbo. the internet was my first safe space, and i miss it dearly. i'm a sucker for retro tech, not only computers but anything retro related. camrecorders, digital cams, old microphones, guitars, you name it.
personal.welcomeMessage: my name is larissa and i just want to make the internet fun again.
